issue.title: [GLib] cuda.cpp compile error
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3634](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3634). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Build errors:
- https://travis-ci.org/kszucs/crossbow/builds/446856145
- https://travis-ci.org/kszucs/crossbow/builds/446855716

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3634?focusedCommentId=16666074) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
This is caused by API change in ARROW-3451.
Arrow GPU GLib should follow the API change.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3634?focusedCommentId=16666091) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 2851
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2851>
